title: New: LAYNE – Good
content:
Name checking Frank Lloyd Wright in a single sounds like something The 1975 would do, and is a pretty decent indication of the level of ambition in this debut single from LA quartet LAYNE.

So it’s not really breaking new ground, but what it does, it does very very well indeed – mixing elements of Broods, CHVRCHES and Lorde with a brilliant outcome. Check it below.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
